articles.description: Bigg Boss 17's latest evicted contestant Anurag Dobhal slammed the makers of the show for his unfair eviction. He joined ETimes TV for an exclusive interview where he spoke about his unfair eviction and stated that the makers had been planning his elimination…
articles.content: A lot of things, people don't even know. I was made to do a walk of shame. They didn't show it. The feedback I got, that it didn't happen. But in that walk of shame, the whole house, all the contesta… [+705 chars]

articles.title: Salaar producer Vijay Kiragandur reveals release date of Prabhas-starrer's sequel: 'Part 2 will be like Game - DNA India
articles.description: 'The script of Salaar 2 is ready and we will start the film any time. Prabhas wants to take it on floors as soon as possible and even Prashanth Neel wants to do it', said Hombale Films owner Vijay Kiragandur.
